email_body: appears as though the time to get in was last wednesday and everybody already missed their chance to get out "Pesot, Jeff" <jeff.pesot@verso.com> on 11/28/2000 02:33:21 PM To: "'jarnold@enron.com'" <jarnold@enron.com> cc: Subject: thursday 6 PM Ruggles on main.
